mapper.select: SELECT GID, FCLTY_NM, RN_ADRES, LNM_ADRES, ZIP, LAT, LON, FCLTY_SE, CTTPC_TELNO, DATA_STDDE, ST_SETSRID(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(#{geom}), 5179) FROM TGD_SCLWLFR_FCLTY_STATUS WHERE 1=1 AND GID = #{gid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TGD_SCLWLFR_FCLTY_STATUS (GID, FCLTY_NM, RN_ADRES, LNM_ADRES, ZIP, LAT, LON, FCLTY_SE, CTTPC_TELNO, DATA_STDDE, GEOM) VALUES (NEXTVAL('TGD_SCLWLFR_FCLTY_STATUS_GID_SEQ'), #{fcltyNm}, #{rnAdres}, #{lnmAdres}, #{zip}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{fcltySe}, #{cttpcTelno}, TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(#{geom}, 5179))
